QuestData.Title: March of the Giants
QuestData.Description: To the east, at Giants' Run, rune-inscribed stone giants have started to migrate north toward Frostblade Peak. What their ultimate destination is, I do not know.$B$BThe glowing runes inscribed in the stone flesh of the giants guide them on their journey.$B$BUse this pick to deactivate the runes on the giants' corpses and return with your findings.
QuestData.LogDescription: Researcher Aderan at Fort Wildervar wants you to use the Runeseeking Pick on the corpses of 4 Runed Stone Giants.
QuestData.RewardText: <Researcher Aderan listens to your findings.>$B$BThe runes for "north" and "west" appeared multiple times? There's a highly reinforced command to move in that direction, but the runes are more than propulsion. Something is attracting them, but what?
